trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation" /> class contains information about a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object and is contained in a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation" /> contiene informazioni su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ed è inclusa in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
A string that contains the DNS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome DNS dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the SID of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
A string that contains the SID of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il SID dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the NetBIOS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
A string that contains the NetBIOS name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome NetBIOS dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the status of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stato dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus" /> values that represents the status of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus" /> che rappresenta lo stato dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="Status" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="Status" /> non è un valore di enumerazione <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus" /> valido.
